pages.text: A strong, flexible material capable of binding tool componets. $(br2)Can also be climbed similar to scaffold, however single pieces are hard to stack.
Grass can be harvested using the $(l:tools/flint_knife)Flint Knife
Vines can be harvested using the $(l:tools/flint_knife)Flint Knife
String can be collected from the usual sources.

An organized coil of rope that can be placed. It will place 8 lengths of rope beneath it. The rope can be extended to ground level by right clicking the coil block. When broken, it drops all the ropes blocks at the top.
